translations: n.[无化] 砷酸盐；砒酸盐

phrs.translation: 砒酸盐, 铅砷酸盐, 砷酸铅
三乙砷酸酯, 三乙基砷酸酯, 三乙基砷酸盐, 三乙申酸酯
酸式砷酸, 砷酸氢铅, 酸式申酸, 酸式砷酸铅
砷酸钠, 砷酸氢二钠, 原砷酸钠
砷酸盐, 砷酸根离子

sentences.sentence: Barium arsenate was proposed as being an extremely insoluble arsenate, but this was shown to be incorrect.
sentences.translation: 钡被作为极其难以解决的砷酸盐，但是这被显示是错误的。

sentences.sentence: It describes the test and operation of zinc sulfate solution purification by antimony trioxide instead of arsenate.
sentences.translation: 介绍硫酸锌溶液由砷盐净化改为锑盐净化的试验及生产实践情况。

sentences.sentence: They may help to define the industrial type of primary deposit and prospecting by the association type of arsenate minerals.
sentences.translation: 根据砷酸盐矿物的组合类型可较快速地确定原生矿床(体)的工业类型和找矿方向。
